channel.title: Mopar, there needs to be more understanding about the new site for moparscape!
channel.description:
As most of you know, nearly every topic in the "Questions" cadagory is "omfg help me with moparscape" "what is this error when i load moparscape?/////?!?!!?i r n00b" "i need moparscape heap plzor" "gawd im a n00b i needod healepd wit moperaskeap" and so on...
You need to put this EVERYWHERE and i mean EVERY WHERE!
This good idea is brought to you by, the following sponcers: Pie 0wnz *many other members* and some gay faggot that jacks his mom off
~Pie

item.title: Mopar, there needs to be more understanding about the new site for moparscape!
item.dc:creator: @Pie_0wnz Pie 0wnz
item.description:
@Pie_0wnz wrote:

[quote=“Taylor, post:8, topic:11888”][quote author=nix link=topic=17693.msg201590#msg201590 date=1157046185]
they could check connections to the router
[/quote]uuh password protected[/quote]

Not that hard to crack, all you really need is the port ip and tada. back door to there comp and all that shit.

Read full topic
